info.name: Musketeer
info.description: The Musketeer from Valda's Spire of Secrets
info.author: Valda's Spire of Secrets

description.p: You believe that camaraderie and glory go hand-in-hand, that you and your allies are undefeatable as long as you stand together. As such, you have trained with blades and halberds, so that you battle up-close. Your place is not supporting them from afar, but launching a single volley of shot before charging in, bayonet or cutlass in hand, that you might all succeed or fail as one.
Starting when you choose this creed at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with the bayonet, cutlass, halberd, rapier, and shortsword.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency with the bayonet, cutlass, halberd, rapier, and shortsword.

description.p: At 3rd level, you can load and fire especially dense bullets. Whenever you hit a target with a blunderbuss, flintlock, or musket, you deal extra damage equal to the number of damage dice rolled for the attack.

sheet.description: Whenever you hit a target with a blunderbuss, flintlock, or musket, you deal extra damage equal to the number of damage dice rolled for the attack.

description.p: At 7th level, you ignore the Loading and Misfire properties of the blunderbuss, flintlock, and musket.

sheet.description: You ignore the Loading and Misfire properties of the blunderbuss, flintlock, and musket.

description.p: Starting at 10th level, when you move 15 feet or more in a straight line on your turn, you can use your bonus action to make one attack with a bayonet or a melee weapon.

sheet.description: When you move 15 feet or more in a straight line on your turn, you can make one attack with a bayonet or a melee weapon.

description.p: By 14th level, whenever a friendly creature within 5 feet of you is targeted by an attack, you can use your reaction to make a firearm attack against the attacker.

sheet.description: Whenever a friendly creature within 5ft of you is targeted by an attack, you can make a firearm attack against the attacker.
